Package br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.view

Package that represents the View part of MVC Design pattern.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation<T extends Node>
    Class to represent a animation on Screen
    CardAnimation
    Animation that make a card go up and down
    CardDownAnimation
    Animation that make a card go down
    CardUpAnimation
    Animation that make a card go up
    FullScreenKeyEventHandler
    Event Listener that allows the game to be full screen
    MouseCardEventListener
    EventHandler to decide what to do when the user clicks in a Card
    PickingCardAnimation
    Animation that simulates the CPU trying to choose a Card

Package br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.view Description

Package that represents the View part of MVC Design pattern. It contains all classes and resources related to screen drawing
Author:
Alexandre Alphonsos Rodrigues Pereira, Jeronimo Nunes Rocha
